ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Training in Kunark
ygData.msgSnippet: What about those Bards that have saved up practice points and Gordon s answer of (paraphrased) We don t want people to become totally self-sufficient on the
ygData.messageBody:
What about those Bards that have saved up practice points and
Gordon's answer of (paraphrased) "We don't want people to become totally
self-sufficient on the new continent" screams of being a cop-out. Other
classes are, why can't we?

- I hope no one took this as a "We are not being treated fair" thread I
started. I was just amazed to find all types of trainers there and yet only
a vendor for bards. That's fine if they never ment them to be there in the
first place then why the hell don't they take them out. Verant seems so
happy to fix "other" bugs that make life "easier" and yet the have made it
easy to never leave Kunark for some.....

I just find it a bit strange that they have not been taken out.... But
stranger yet. If they wern't ment to be there then why such a vast "city"
of "merchant" type buildings????



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
